release.action: All types of Java collections can now be used, specifically Sets. (408)
Made database authenticator more configurable by moving (optional) SQL into properties and allowing algorithm to be switched off or changed
Bug 418: Fixtures always run against PostgreSQL database - fix by checking both upper and lower case names for table existence.
Currency, in expense example, was not resolving itself - added resolve calls for each get method.
Made bounded objects in expenses DOM immutable so users cannot edit them

Replaced the TransientObjectStore with InMemoryObjectStore. This stores the POJOs rather than the adapters and hence work more like an persisting object store as the objects are retrieved from memory and adapters are created for them. This is particularly important when fixtures are run and the system is reset before running. (422)
Transient border now recursively works through views checking for valid fields. (423)
All adapters now handle the empty state consistently and with out throwing NPE. (413) Have reviewed and consolidated the parsing, encoding and decoding of adapter values.

Bug 420 Hib OS: ConcurrentListModification in Hibernate when deployed via Tomcat (works okay in Jetty). Fixed by removing pre and post flush interceptors that update resolving state (to and from serializing).
Blank lines are now ignored in password files, and invalid entries are flagged. (425)
HTML page builder now has a default title so every page is guaranteed to display with a title. (425)
Choices method for properties can now be lists or arrays. (426)
Choices drop down on value fields now show the selection that was made. (426)
Collection views, when updated, no longer remove duplicated elements. (415)
Named parameters (using @Named) are no longer being ignored when internationalization decorator is used. (416)
All removed views are now released from the view update notifier list. (407)
Fixed hanging of DND Viewer when dropping object onto field within the top-level form view. (412)
Using the back button on the browser doesn't not cause exception anymore when a link is selected or a task is completed. (414)
If an reflectively called method throws a runtime exception this is now thrown on (rather than a ReflectionException)
The RegEx processor now places a much better message into the regex failure exception
Descriptions for options are changed to an empty string instead of being left as null (for better message concatenation).
If a regex fails to validate a field or parameter the user is now prevented from saving (in HTML and DND). (111)
Refactored web code to be independent of servlet implmentation classes for ASP.NET port

Objects that are destroyed are flaged as such (with a ResolveState of DESTROYED) and any root views are removed from DND UI. (417)
When actions are execute remotely, or locally and changes are passed to the server, the set of objects that has been disposed is passed back to the client so it can remove the views of the disposed objects.
Mouse pointer was not changing to resize cursor when over a resizable view.
